attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To give mums more time at home with disabled children, with a small benefit for looking after these children.
But only going back into the workplace when child(ren) aged over 10 yrs.

rejection.details: This petition is ok, but you need to be more explicit in your aims so people know what they are signing up to. The main sentence needs more detail.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
